forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of around one inch possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain and snow. Mostly cloudy. High near 38, with temperatures falling to around 29 in the afternoon. North northwest wind 9 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 32 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New snow accumulation of around one inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Light Snow then Partly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow before 7pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 16. Northwest wind 8 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 28, with temperatures falling to around 26 in the afternoon. West wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 15. West wind 2 to 7 mph.

forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible
forecast.shortForecast: Light Snow Likely And Patchy Blowing Snow
forecast.detailedForecast: Snow likely and patchy blowing snow and patchy freezing drizzle. Mostly cloudy. High near 26, with temperatures falling to around 20 in the afternoon. North wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of around one inch possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy blowing snow before 7pm, then patchy blowing snow and scattered snow showers. Mostly cloudy. Low around 16, with temperatures rising to around 18 overnight. Northwest wind 5 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New snow accumulation of around one inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Snow Showers And Patchy Blowing Snow
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow showers and patchy blowing snow. Mostly cloudy. High near 27, with temperatures falling to around 25 in the afternoon. Northwest wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow showers. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 18. Northwest wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible
forecast.shortForecast: Light Snow Likely And Patchy Blowing Snow
forecast.detailedForecast: Snow likely and patchy blowing snow and a slight chance of freezing drizzle before 1pm, then patchy blowing snow and patchy freezing drizzle and isolated snow showers. Mostly cloudy. High near 26, with temperatures falling to around 19 in the afternoon. North wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of 1 to 2 inches possible
forecast.shortForecast: Patchy Blowing Snow then Chance Snow Showers And Areas Of Blowing Snow
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy blowing snow and isolated snow showers before 7pm, then a chance of snow showers and areas of blowing snow between 7pm and 1am, then areas of blowing snow and scattered snow showers. Mostly cloudy. Low around 12, with temperatures rising to around 15 overnight. Northwest wind 5 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New snow accumulation of 1 to 2 inches possible.

forecast.detailedForecast: Areas of blowing snow and a chance of snow showers. Mostly cloudy. High near 25, with temperatures falling to around 23 in the afternoon. Northwest wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New snow accumulation of around one inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday Night
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow showers. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 14. West wind 0 to 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: From the park website: Bucks Run is currently closed.  Snow is currently being made for Bucks Run and construction will being in the coming weeks. The golf course trails, Coyote Run and Hawk Hills, along with Cedar Trace were rolled December 9, 2025.  No additional grooming has taken place.

nubsNob.xcTrails: Please access the XC trails from Valley road during snowmaking. The upper trails are groomed and in great shape.
nubsNob.comments: Nub's Nob is closed today so that we can concentrate on snowmaking. We will be open daily beginning Friday, December 12. The Snow Crew is making exceptional progress and we plan to have all of the frontside and southside runs open this Friday which will bring our run count to over 30 runs. Pintail Peak will open by the following weekend. Thanks for skiing at Nub's Nob.
